title: Fleet Application - Plan of Action and Milestones (POA&M)

poam_items.weakness_description: The Model Context Protocol SDK has a Regular Expression Denial of Service vulnerability with no fix currently available from the upstream maintainer.
mitigation_in_place: Rate limiting on MCP-related endpoints (2 req/min)
Non-critical AI feature - not required for core operations
Input validation on all MCP inputs
poam_items.milestone: Monitor for upstream fix; replace if fix not available by Q1 2026

poam_items.weakness_name: RSA Keys Stored in Local PEM Files
poam_items.weakness_description: JWT signing keys are currently stored in local PEM files rather than a secure key vault service.
mitigation_in_place: PEM files are excluded from source control
poam_items.milestone: Migrate to Azure Key Vault for key storage and management

poam_items.weakness_description: 50 visual regression tests are currently skipped due to test data injection complexity and baseline stabilization needs.
mitigation_in_place: Manual visual QA in staging environment
poam_items.milestone: Re-enable visual tests with stable baselines

poam_items.weakness_description: esbuild and drizzle-kit have moderate vulnerabilities. These are development-only dependencies not included in production builds.
Some production code paths still use console.log instead of the structured Winston logger.
mitigation_in_place: Winston logger available and used in critical paths
Console output not exposed to users
Logs are captured by container runtime
poam_items.milestone: Replace all console.log with Winston logger

certification_impact.fedramp_low: No blocking items - all mitigated or accepted
certification_impact.fedramp_moderate: POA-002 (Key Vault) should be completed before authorization
